name: Avatars
description:
Add random user avatars to your designs with one click!

Select any type of element and run the plugin. It will fetch an avatar image and add it as a fill on your selected element.

You can also run the plugin without anything selected and it will add an element with an avatar.

Images are aggregated by UIfaces.co from various sources including randomuser.me, tinyfac.es, imdb.com, donated images, and other sources.
